0.1 Second - Data Visualisation campaign

Overview

A view shared by most data visualisation experts is to make design visualisations that takes the viewer 0.1 second to understand the most important content.

Year

September 2018

Role

InforVis design

  • User experience
  • Visual design

In 2018, my Data Visualisation concept was selected to be used as the University's data visualisations exhibition poster. This was inspired by the 0.1 second rule in datavis design

Next Project

Liquidnet
